messages.subject: Hee hee, first to post >Peabody Unsch Conf
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, What an amazing day! We are so new to all of this but it was nothing short of fascinating to see other unschooling families and also, to be looking at
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

What an amazing day! We are so new to all of this but it was nothing
short of fascinating to see other unschooling families and also, to be
looking at everyone's name tag to find familiar names! I've met a few
people who post here and am looking forward to going back tomorrow.

Ben Lovejoy was SO enthralling. There were maybe 20-30 people in the
room. His talk made SO MUCH SENSE. It was also great to hear that, for
their son, it took 18 months to deschool. I'm there! And it's a scary
feeling, at times. I'm excited for my husband to go to the Dad's talk
tomorrow! I can't imagine a skeptic remaining after hearing Ben talk :)

I'm beaming! And I had to share! :)

Warmly
Tonya
Proud mama to
Christian 5-30-95
Rory 6-9-99
Alannah 6-18-03
